sentences.sContent: Stone is the foundation, above which is soil, and then topsoil.
sentences.sContent_eng: Stone is the foundation, above which is soil, and then topsoil.
sentences.sCn: 石头是基础，上面是泥土，再上面是表土。

sentences.sContent: After shoveling out the topsoil, Garfinkel uncovered coins and other artifacts from the time of Alexander the Great.
sentences.sContent_eng: After shoveling out the topsoil, Garfinkel uncovered coins and other artifacts from the time of Alexander the Great.
sentences.sCn: 在铲去了表层土以后，加芬克尔发现了来自亚历山大大帝时期的硬币和其他人工制品。

remMethod.val: top(顶上的) + soil(土地) → 表层土

trans.tranOther: the upper level of soil in which most plants have their roots
